    • Fraction

      public Fraction(int wholeNumVal)
      This is a parametrized Constructor in creating a Fraction Object
      Parameters:
      wholeNumVal - this parameter is used if the fraction has a denominator of 1

    • Fraction

      public Fraction(int numerator, int denominator)
      This is a parametrized Constructor in creating a Fraction Object
      Parameters:
      numerator - this parameter will be the numerator of the Fraction
      denominator - this parameter will be the denominator of the Fraction

    • computeGCD

      protected static int computeGCD(int a, int b)
      This method is used to compute for GCD.
      Parameters:
      a - this will serve as the 1st denominator for the computation of the GCD
      b - this will serve as the 2nd denominator for the computation of the GCD

    • computeLCM

      protected static int computeLCM(int a, int b)
      This method is used to compute the LCD of a fraction. This is useful in adding, subtracting fractions and comparing fractions
      Parameters:
      a - this will serve as the 1st denominator for the computation of the LCM
      b - this will serve as the 2nd denominator for the computation of the LCM

    • add

      public Fraction add(Fraction other)
      This method adds fraction objects. Uses the computeLCM method.
      Specified by:
      add in interface Arithmetics
      Parameters:
      other - this fraction object accesses the value of the 2nd fraction that will be added to the first fraction
      Returns:
      returns the sum of the two fractions in reduced form using reduceFraction method

    • subtract

      public Fraction subtract(Fraction other)
      This method subtracts fraction objects. Uses the computeLCM method.
      Specified by:
      subtract in interface Arithmetics
      Parameters:
      other - this fraction object accesses the value of the 2nd fraction that will be subtracted from the first fraction
      Returns:
      returns the difference of the two fractions in reduced form using reduceFraction method

    • multiplyBy

      public Fraction multiplyBy(Fraction other)
      This method multiplies fraction objects.
      Specified by:
      multiplyBy in interface Arithmetics
      Parameters:
      other - this fraction object accesses the value of the 2nd fraction that will be multiplied by the first fraction
      Returns:
      returns the product of the two fractions in reduced form using reduceFraction method

    • divideBy

      public Fraction divideBy(Fraction other)
      This method divides fraction objects.
      Specified by:
      divideBy in interface Arithmetics
      Parameters:
      other - this fraction object accesses the value of the 2nd fraction that will be divided from the first fraction
      Returns:
      returns the quotient of the two fractions in reduced form using reduceFraction method

      public Fraction reduceFraction()
      This method reduce fractions and returns the lowest form of the fraction
